messages.content: You will very shortly be able to vote in one of the most important General Elections in decades, when you cast your vote 12th December.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Get Brexit done and start talking about our other priorities.

mentions.candidate: I offer myself as a strong, effective, genuinely local candidate, with a proud record of listening, campaigning and delivering for our area - and with the promise of more.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour government driven by hard-left socialist dogma that aspires to control peoples' lives and will surely destroy the economy.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit is a major issue in this campaign, as it has been for the last three years. I hear them saying that they want to get Brexit done and start talking about our other priorities.
issues.economy: Labour government driven by hard-left socialist dogma that aspires to control peoples' lives and will surely destroy the economy upon which our livelihoods and public services depend.

quotes.text: My offer to you is one of a hard-working, effective, local candidate who is deeply committed to West Oxfordshire, who will get Brexit done and support a positive Conservative agenda.

examples: I offer myself as a strong, effective, genuinely local candidate, with a proud record of listening, campaigning and delivering for our area - and with the promise of more.
I offer myself as a strong, effective, genuinely local candidate, with a proud record of listening, campaigning and delivering for our area - and with the promise of more.
Brexit is a major issue in this campaign, as it has been for the last three years.
Labour government driven by hard-left socialist dogma that aspires to control peoples' lives and will surely destroy the economy upon which our livelihoods and public services depend.

The other candidates only promise, in their different ways, more division, more discord, more uncertainty - and will enable a hard-left Corbyn Government that will destroy all that is most precious about this country.

The other candidates only promise, in their different ways, more division, more discord, more uncertainty - and will enable a hard-left Corbyn Government that will destroy all that is most precious about this country.
Labour government driven by hard-left socialist dogma that aspires to control peoples' lives and will surely destroy the economy upon which our livelihoods and public services depend.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: I offer myself as a strong, effective, genuinely local candidate, with a proud record of listening, campaigning and delivering for our area - and with the promise of more.
